this_title: A Convenient Truth: Urban Solutions from Curitiba, Brazil
introduction: There is hope! This inspirational documentary shows a city where urban solutions are not just theory, but a reality. The film shows innovations in the areas of transportation, recycling, social benefits (affordable housing), parks, and the great philosophy behind the successful leaders that transformed Curitiba in a model green city.Written by Giovanni Vaz Del Bello and Maria Terezinha Vaz
